description: If transcrypt is installed, this command allows you to pass options directly to transcrypt. With the environment configured to use the yadm repository. Transcrypt enables transparent encryption and decryption of files in a Git repository. More information: https://github.com/elasticdog/transcrypt.

useCases.description: Set the symmetric cipher to utilize for encryption:
Pass the password to derive the key from:
Assume yes and accept defaults for non-specified options:
Display the current repository's cipher and password:
Re -encrypt all encrypted files using new credentials:
